Message: Added support for non-Unicode destinations on big endian systems
Added flag for BW DATS datatypes
Updated property naming in LINQ code generation to suppress names starting with underscore
Bug fix for escaping // characters in SavePlainData function
Removed R3Connection.IsBusy (has been marked as obsolete since 27.03.2014)
Marked ClientProtocol.HttpSoap as obsolete
Fix for using automatic column detection with reports that have a line break
Fix for OHS meta data handling
Fixed metadata check (length)
Fix for bad column captions during preview when adding units to the measure columns
SID structure is extracted for all hierarchies instead of table
Updated logic for table filterbox to allow searching descriptions.
Fixed bug in table filterbox to disable drops.
Updated import logic to display error messages for invalid models.
Added additional validation logic.
Correction for handling certain BCD datatypes which were calculated too small (e.g. LIPS-UEBTO)
Fixed bug in table lookup form
Fixed bug in table filterbox to allow deleting text input.
Added setter for isABAPStringFormat of DataTableMetaData
Updated the table field filter box to support clear button.
Updated table join dialog in TQB.
Added support to display dynamic tooltips for table join definitions in TQB.
Added support to import and export query in TQB
Added date recognition for BW Cubes
Fixed minor bugs,
Added support for variable definition used by Xtract IS for grouping criteria in TQB.
Fixed bug in drag and drop logic of the table filterbox in TQB.
Now auto-join feature is supported for pasted tables in TQB.
Added support to sort table fields by name in TQB.
Updated auto-join feature in TQB.
Added support for non-unicode RFC destinations on big endian systems
Updated to 4.27.0.0
Changed recent used objects (RUO) sorting in table lookup dialog.
Added new auto-join feature in TQB.
Added new filterbox to filter table fields if table contains a large number of fields,
Fixed bugs with aggregate function combobox in output field selection panel.
Fixed bugs with alias naming in TQB.
Updated resource loading problem once TQB is referenced in related products.
RFC Server logging is switched on automatically when client logging/tracing active
Fix for function module Z_XTRACT_IS_TABLE_COMPRESSION. Conversion exit for ALPHA conversion was not called correctly.
Refactored look-up & metadata retrieval
Correction for fields of type decimal with 0 decimal digits
